long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_U:
Get savin' with Raiven

Never miss a better option while purchasing online. Raiven lets you check your unique pricing and offers from your suppliers—directly on other sites! Find better prices, shipping, availability, and more. It's never been easier to see and compare your options.
  
• Automatic availability lookup
• See your unique supplier pricing—even on other sites
• Avoid the tabs! Find the same item across suppliers wherever you are
• See your exclusive benefits from your suppliers
• Enhance your Marketplace experience with assisted help and alerts
long.en_GB,es:
Never miss a better option while purchasing online. Raiven lets you check your unique pricing and offers from your suppliers—directly on other sites! Find better prices, shipping, availability, and more. It's never been easier to see and compare your options.
  
• See your unique supplier pricing—even on other sites
• Similar matches help you know when you have a better option
• Add products to your cart from all over the web
• See your exclusive benefits from your suppliers
long.nl:
Vind altijd wat u zoekt met de Raiven browser-extensie. Voeg distributeurs toe aan uw persoonlijke overzicht om live beschikbaarheid van Schneider Electric producten bij uw favoriete groothandel te zien.

• Bekijk de actuele beschikbaarheid bij meerdere groothandels tegelijk 
• Werkt op Google, onze website en de websites van aangesloten groothandels 
• U kunt direct doorklikken om te bestellen.
